questions.text: Nico Minoru is the de facto leader of the group. What is her alias?
questions.explanation:
Sister Grimm.

	Nico took her superhero alias from her Instant Messenger screename. While all members of the Runaways have aliases, they commonly go by their real names. Nico dresses in black and listens to Goth music.

questions.text: Chase Stein's parents held what occupation?
questions.explanation:
They were scientists.

	Chase's parents were both scientists and members of the supervillain group known as The Pride, along with the parents of every other Runaway. Chase originally had super-powered gloves, but these were destroyed in battle.

questions.text: Gertrude Yorkes took the name Arsenic for a little while, but when she meets her older self, what alias does she go by?
questions.explanation:
Heroine.

	Gertrude Yorkes has a psychic bond with a deinonychus, a dinosaur that looks like a velociraptor. She has been romantically linked with Chase Stein.

questions.text: Karolina Dean is an alien who was raised as a human. What is the name of the Skrull she marries?
questions.explanation:
Xavin.

	Karolina's parents, while seemingly famous movie actors, were really aliens and members of the supervillain group The Pride. Because of her alien heritage, Karolina can fly and manipulate solar energy.

questions.text: Molly Hayes is a mutant capable of lifting incredible amounts of weight! Sadly, her powers have one drawback. What is it?
questions.correct: She grows tired after using her powers
options: Before using her powers, she must cut herself
Using her powers takes one year off of her lifespan
Using her powers also injures her
questions.explanation:
She grows tired after using her powers.

	Molly, at eleven, is the youngest member of the Runaways, and is also known as Bruiser. (If she had her choice, she would be called Princess Powerful.)Molly loves Chocolate Frosted Sugar Bombs, which was the same cereal enjoyed by Calvin in "Calvin and Hobbes".

questions.text: Victor Mancha is a cyborg, created by one of Marvel's most dastardly villains! Which one is it?
questions.explanation:
Ultron.

	Ultron created Victor to one day destroy all the superheroes on the planet. He seems to be innocent for now, and has once even defied his "programming", but the team still does not completely trust him.

questions.text: What was unique about Alex Wilder, a former member of the Runaways who did not take an alias?
options: He was actually the superhero known as Chamber
He was confined to a wheelchair
questions.explanation:
He had no super powers.

	Alex Wilder was the original leader of the group, but he had no super powers! Alex was later discovered to be a mole, keeping tabs on the group for their parents, the supervillain group called The Pride. Alex was later killed by the alien race known as the Gibborim.

questions.text: Topher was a young man whom the Runaways rescued from armed robbers. He nearly seduced Karolina Dean.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Topher seduced Nico Minoru, not Karolina Dean. Topher later revealed that he was a vampire and intended on making Nico one as well, as well as killing the rest of the Runaways. He died when he drank Karolina's blood.

questions.text: What is the organization for former child superheroes called?
questions.explanation:
Excelsior.

	Some members of Excelsior are Dusk, Ricochet and Turbo, who is a former member of the New Warriors. Excelsior's mission is to dissuade child and teenaged superheroes from continuing into adulthood.

questions.text: The Gibborim are the alien race who worked closesly with The Pride. How many fingers does a regular Gibborim have on each hand?
questions.explanation:
Six.

	A regular Gibborim has six fingers on each hand. Nightcrawler, of the X-Men, has three fingers on each hand. The Gibborim fought against the Runaways and later killed The Pride.
